entry.title: Monday: Partly cloudy. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023
